setupPasskey.title: Setup Passkey
setupPasskey.description: Skip passwords. Use your device’s biometrics for fast, safe access.
setupPasskey.benefits.secure.title: More secure
setupPasskey.benefits.accessibility.title: One tap, you’re in
setupPasskey.benefits.accessibility.description: Log in with your device in seconds.

bottomSheet.title: Are you sure?
bottomSheet.description: Without a passkey, your wallet may be less protected and you’ll need to log in manually each time.

settings.tabs.security.auto.approval.description: Ask for approval ahead of transactions.
settings.tabs.verify.description: We’ve sent a 6-digit code to your email. Check your inbox or spam folder.
settings.tabs.two.fa.setup.title: You’ll need the Google Authenticator app to continue.
settings.tabs.two.fa.setup.description: Download it from the App Store or Play Store.
settings.tabs.two.fa.connect.description: Copy the key below and add it to your Google Authenticator app
settings.tabs.two.fa.verify.description:
Enter the 6-digit code from Google
 Authenticator.
